title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.2 - Records of release minimization programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 380-8.2 - Records of release minimization programs

State Regulations

Each permittee must maintain records of the release
minimization program, including: (a) the provisions of the program; and
(b) audits and other reviews of program
content and implementation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
380-8.2

Amended

New

York State Register April 25, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 17, eff. 5/10/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
